public static class LocalContext.Variable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents a LocalContext variable.

Constructor Detail

LocalContext.Variable

public LocalContext.Variable()
Default constructor.

Method Detail

getValue

public java.lang.Object getValue()
Returns the context-local value of this LocalContext.Variable. The first outer LocalContext is searched first, then all outer LocalContext are recursively searched up to the global root context.

Returns:
the context-local value or null if its mapped value is null or if this variable is not set.

getValue

public java.lang.Object getValue(java.lang.Object defaultValue)
Returns the context-local value of this LocalContext.Variable. The first outer LocalContext is searched first, then all outer LocalContext are recursively searched up to the global root context.

Parameters:
defaultValue - the default value to return if this variable is mapped to null or if not set.
Returns:
the context-local value or defaultValue.

setValue

public void setValue(java.lang.Object value)
Sets the context-local value of this LocalContext.Variable.

Parameters:
value - the new context-local value.

unset

public void unset()
Removes the context-local setting of this LocalContext.Variable. The setting is then inherited by outer LocalContext or the global root context.
